message.body: Do you have any Aleve perchance? Chloe's foot is swelling real bad.
Oh goodness Chloe... I don't think I have aleve in my room but go through the bottom drawer of my night stand thing and see if there's anything that could help
It's alright we got some ibuprofen! She's freaking the fuck out though. Might need to invest in some sedatives. ;)
Hahaha she can't deny it anymore
yes! just about to text you... can we have a quick meeting in tisch lounge at 6?
